title.native: 武装少女マキャヴェリズム

description:
Originally, Aichi Coexistence Private Academy was an all-girls school for privileged young ladies until it was decided that it would become co-ed. The fearful girls were permitted to bring weapons to protect themselves, and then a vigilante group was established called the “Supreme Five Swords." When rebellious Nomura Fudou is sent to the academy, he is given two options: act and dress like a girl or be expelled!

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

title.native: 武装少女マキャヴェリズム
武装少女マキャヴェリズム OVA

node.description: Hiromi Mizutani is a composer and arranger from Nagoya, Japan.  In addition to Zill O'll -infinite- and Yuusha 30, Hiromi Mizutani also composed music for the game Red Seeds Profile, known as Deadly Premonition outside of Japan.  He is a member of Team-MAX along with Yasuharu Takanashi, Kenji Fujisawa, Hiroshi Motofuji, Shuji Katayama and REMI.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/animeo0015) | [Website](http://yonisumu.fc2web.com/)

Worked as a composite artist in the beginning of his career.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/TkashiWatanabe)

Joined Top Craft as an animator while still attending university, switched his focus to directing in the late '80s.

Married to [Miyata Naomi](https://anilist.co/staff/220081/).

Affiliated with Studio Live. Admires [Kazuko Tadano](https://anilist.co/staff/118426/).

Her designs are very shoujo manga like, often featuring glittering eyes.

__Graduated:__ Toyo University

During school Sawai always aimed to be manga artist. After graduating from Toyo University he joined Tatsunoko Production where he became a storyboard artist and later episode director. He served two more years as a production assistant there until he left and became a freelance episode director. Today he works mainly for Bee Train, whose founder Kouichi Mashimo is a good friend of his.
**Ryuu Sakamoto** is a Japanese art designer and background artist.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Hiroki_Chura)

The current director of Chura Sound.
